entries.original: Thanks to @reneleonhardt for helping update a number of our dependencies (we now build with Rust 1.88!): https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1494
entries.translated: 여러 종속성을 업데이트하는 데 도움을 준 @reneleonhardt에게 감사드립니다 (이제 Rust 1.88로 빌드합니다!): https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1494

entries.original: Removed reference to `/compact` in https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1503 because it is not supported yet: https://github.com/openai/codex/issues/1257
entries.translated: 아직 지원되지 않기 때문에 `/compact`에 대한 참조 제거: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1503 https://github.com/openai/codex/issues/1257

entries.original: Thanks to @pchuri so that when running Codex installed via `npm`, `process.platform === "android"` will run the Rust CLI: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1488
entries.translated: @pchuri 덕분에 `npm`을 통해 설치된 Codex를 실행할 때 `process.platform === "android"`가 Rust CLI를 실행합니다: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1488

entries.original: Fix generated shell completions to use the name `codex` instead of `codex-cli`: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1496
entries.translated: 생성된 셸 자동 완성이 `codex-cli` 대신 `codex` 이름을 사용하도록 수정: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1496
